title: srI rAma nannu brOva
sahitya:
shrI rAma nannubrOva samayamurA vEgamE krta janA dhAruDau sItA manOhara

anupallavi

 parAku jEyaka rArA nAyeDa darAdhi pAnana varA logipuDu

caraNam

 kAruNya mUrtiyani nAradAdi munulu nIraja nayana ninnu prApukala pogaDaga
shrI raghuvara ninnu nI pogaDa taramA shrInivAsa nannu nI marava tagunA
